mapper.update: update mafia_role set role = #{role} where user_id = #{userId}
update mafia_vote set vote_cnt = vote_cnt+1 where room_no = #{roomNo} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from mafia_vote mv1 where mv1.vote_cnt = (select max(vote_cnt) from mafia_vote mv2 where mv2.room_no = #{roomNo})

select mr.room_no, mr.role, m.user_id, m.user_nicknm from mafia_role mr join member m on mr.user_id = m.user_id where mr.user_id = (select user_id from mafia_vote mv1 where mv1.vote_cnt = (select max(vote_cnt) from mafia_vote mv2 where mv2.room_no = #{roomNo}))
mapper.update: update mafia_role set role_st = 1 where room_no = #{roomNo} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from mafia_role where role_st = 0 and room_no = #{room_no}
mapper.update: update mafia_vote set vote_cnt = 0 where room_no = #{roomNo}
mapper.delete: delete from mafia_role where room_no = #{roomNo} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update mafia_room set join_cnt = join_cnt-1 where room_no = #{roomNo}
mapper.select: select join_cnt from mafia_room where room_no = #{roomNo}
